description._content: Image taken from: Title: "A historical collection, from official records, files, etc. of the part sustained by Connecticut during the war of the Revolution. With an appendix, containing important letters, depositions, etc., written during the war. Compiled by R. R. Hinman" Author: HINMAN, Royal Ralph. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 1446.f.8." Page: 8 Place of Publishing: Hartford Date of Publishing: 1842 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001689267 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
